message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $120 for the product. Thank you for considering my offer.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $200 is my bottom line. I'm confident you won't find a better product for this price.
